coreAtributes.name: Fancy Lacy Bra
coreAtributes.description: A fancy low-cut bra that reveals a lot of the wearer's cleavage. This particular design is made from a soft, thin fabric, and has a lot of lace trimmings.

displacementText.playerSelf: You slide your bra's straps off your shoulders before tugging it down to reveal your [pc.breasts+].
displacementText.playerNPC: You slide your bra's straps off your shoulders before tugging it down to reveal your [pc.breasts+].
